alert.note: Alert for Northwest Nicholas; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nicholas, northeastern Kanawha, southern Roane, Clay and northwestern Fayette Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 815 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charleston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clay, Montgomery, Clendenin, Cedar Grove, Glasgow, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Pratt, Pinch, Glen, Elkview, Amma, Wallback, Handley, Bickmore, Procious, Swiss, Indore, Bentree and Ivydale. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 7 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central, southeastern, north central and northwestern West Virginia.
